titleStmt.title: Somnium Cantabrigiense, or A poem vpon the death of the late King brought to London, by a post to the muses.
titleStmt.author: Post to the Muses.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Matthew Simmons next doore to the Golden Lyon in Aldersgate Street,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "March 20"; the imprint date has been altered to 1649.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: Matthew Simmons next doore to the Golden Lyon
